title: the 2moons FIX files
description:
Ok guys heres the only fix the the "cannot connect to server" error alot of us are getting.  Had to go to extreme measures cause this download can take some time...

Heres how to put this file your going to download into use.  The file your downloading is just plainly named, 2moons.  It&#039;s the same file you&#039;ve already got except this one will make your game work.  Copy this file you download to the same spot where the other 2moons file is located.  So this file should go to C:\Program Files\Acclaim.  just fyi...its gonna ask you one of those "yes to all to replace questions" hit yes to all obviously....its replacing the same named file blah blah i know but.....the files in this torrent will make your game work. 

Now this is all you have to do. no restarting or anything like that just run the game and go.  

Anyquestions, IM me on AIM. sn = joshs5391
